disabled.description: Disables the oj-option if set to true.

value.description: Specifies the oj-option's value. The value is associated with the oj-option element whose display value may be different.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a [property]Changed event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves a value for a property or a single subproperty for complex properties.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

refresh.description: Refreshes the visual state of the component.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

slots.description: Child content for oj-option. This is normally the text node that displays for oj-option.

endIcon.description: Named slot for the oj-option's end icon.

startIcon.description: Named slot for the oj-option's start icon.
